reviews.title: Nefunguje
reviews.comment: Po aktivacii mi vypise, ze mam mobil banking aktivovany, ale pri prihlaseni mi vyskoci okno, ze nemam aktivovany profil.
reviews.author: Peter Jurkovi\304\215

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: High quality app, nice new features. Quick to download (just a view mb) .
reviews.author: Gerard Kooistra

reviews.title: Doporucuji
reviews.comment: Prijemna aplikace, umi vse, co potrebuji.
reviews.author: Ond\305\231ej Malina

reviews.title: Lacking functions
reviews.comment: Account list, transaction history and payment order - very poor range of options (im comparison with the competition) makes this app worth a lot less than it could be. I would expect more from the biggest Czech bank with the highest fees.
reviews.author: Tom\303\241\305\241 Zilvar

reviews.title: Fine app
reviews.comment: I am missing feature to change account limit / card limit. ATM map is useful.
reviews.author: Alex Alexei

reviews.title: Nefunguje na CyanogenMod 7
reviews.comment: B\303\255da - Nefunguje na CyanogenMod 7 B2 pro Alcatel V860 (Vodafone Smart II) Rajfka, FIO i Airbank funguj\303\255 bez probl\303\251m\305\257.
reviews.author: Ond\305\231ej Novotn\303\275

reviews.title: Je\305\241t\304\233 p\303\241r funkc\303\255 a bude to super aplikace
reviews.comment: Jinak ale spokojenost, kone\304\215n\304\233 nemus\303\255m pou\305\276\303\255vat neohraban\303\275 GSM banking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Well designed, good looking, intuitive and has all you can imagine - you can see your payment history, make a payment, find ATMs, branches, contact details.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: neni ta aplikace az moc jednoducha?
reviews.comment: Pripadne to jen me az moc jednoduche? vzdyt tam neni videt ani tak jednoducha informace jako je disponibilni a ucetni zustatek, nemluve o tom ze kdyz uz teda do internetoveho bankovnictvi zadali grafy .. tak to taky mohlo byt i v mobilni verzi .. no cele mi to pripada dost nedokoncene... ale aspon ze to zadavani prikazu funguje..
reviews.author: Tomas Fribert

reviews.title: Good app, but ...
reviews.comment: There is no option to access Savings account and transfer money from/to the Savings account.
reviews.author: Adler Mobasser

reviews.title: Dobre
reviews.comment: Konecne! Jednoducha a uzitecna mobilni banka. Nema nic mimoradneho, a taky skoda, ze CS umoznuje instalaci jen na jednom zarizeni. Musel jsem kvuli tomu odinstalovat z iPadu :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hura!
reviews.comment: Cekal jsem na to uz mesice.. zatimco ostatni banky to uz davno meli, Sporka jeste ne.. diky moc. Aplikace je naprosto dostacujici :)
reviews.author: A Google User
